author: CarolynCX
title: quint little hotel - recommend
text:
Will stay here again. Clean. Very friendly service. Just enough English. Breakfast is good with basic BF choices and more Chinese food. If you become a member (with a small fee), there would be discount and free breakfast. I had trouble joining due to some technical issues initially, but the front desk was very helpful in that. PROS: 1. I found it is conveniently located:10-15min walk to the subway and TianTan Park. 2. There is a morning local farmer's market 2 min away.
CONS: 1. Bathroom: lack of privacy-common in many new hotels there. 2. Local law dictates non-smoking, but like many things there, it is difficult to enforce. The unhappy guests may bad mouth the hotel online. So if you are unlucky to have smokers who smoke in their room with the door OPEN, you may want to take action yourself. I spoke the annoyance just loud enough in the corridor to my family, and the chain smoker hurried over and closed the door. A little better.
